headline: Can Lennar's Tech Bets Like Opendoor Drive Future Value?

headline: GAMCO Sends Letter to Lennar Corporation Regarding Lennar’s Proposed Exchange Offer
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., October 13, 2025--GAMCO Investors, Inc. ("GAMCO") (OTCQX: GAMI), on behalf of its clients and certain affiliates, collectively owns approximately 1,719,782 shares of Lennar Corporation ("Lennar") Class B Common Stock, representing 5.5% of the 31,217,013 outstanding Class B shares. On October 10, 2025, GAMCO sent a letter to the Board of Directors of Lennar, as follows:

headline: Housing: A Brutal Year Likely Ahead
summary: The U.S. residential real estate market, the world's largest asset class, is showing notable warning signs of trouble and serious stress. Read the full analysis now.
